full_description:
Acer SA100 120GB 2.5" SATA lll SSD

The Acer SA100 2.5" SATA lll SSD is equipped with high-quality 3D NAND flash memory ICs, which have undergone extensive testing by our engineers to achieve efficient data read-and-write performance. This significantly improves system startup speed as well as application loading time, enabling smoother and faster processing. It is built with a 4-channel flash controller and original high-quality 3D NAND Flash, SA100 SATA III SSD provides PCs with ultra-high performance at a price that won't break the bank. The Acer SA100 2.5" SSD comes with a 120 GB storage capacity which can easily store video, audio, and any other files for your entertainment, home office, or study use. The Acer SA100 2.5" SSD is lightweight, thin, and compact. Its maximum power consumption in working mode is lower compared to mainstream SATA SSDs with the same capacity. The Acer SA100 SSD comes with a 3-year limited warranty.

title: Acer FA100 256GB M.2 NVMe PCIe Gen3 x 4 SSD
cat_seo_title: Acer SSD Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Acer SSD at best price in Bangladesh. Latest Acer PCIe M.2 SSD, SATA 2.5" SSD, SATA M.2 SSD available at Star Tech Shop. Order online to get delivery anywhere in BD.
full_description:
Acer FA100 256GB M.2 NVMe PCIe Gen3 x 4 SSD

The Acer FA100 comes with a 256GB storage capacity and it offers read/write speeds of 1950Mbps and 1300Mbps respectively. It supports ECC error correction technology and S.M.A.R.T. function, based on 4K LDPC which enables stronger error correction capabilities and improved secure data storage. This effectively reduces data errors that may occur during SSD read and write, avoiding bad blocks for better performance and more reliability. The Acer FA100 M.2 SSD supports HMB function which enables the underlying storage to make use of a portion of host memory effectively reducing SSD latency by simulating SLC cache. More optimizations improve read and write performance and the drive even supports TRIM instructions to significantly reduce write amplification and effectively extend SSD life. Each SSD comes bundled with Acronis True-Image backup software. It supports multiple technologies such as modern standby and ultra-low power consumption. The Acer FA100 offers a 5-year warranty.

full_description:
Acer FA200 500GB M.2 NVMe PCIe Gen4 x 4 SSD

The Acer FA200 500GB M.2 NVMe PCIe Gen4 x 4 SSD is a potent storage solution made particularly for gamers and video producers seeking unrivaled performance and durability. With speed, compatibility, and durability as its top priorities, this SSD is prepared to revolutionize your computer experience. The Acer FA200 can achieve blazingly quick sequential read speeds of up to 6300 MB/s thanks to premium NAND memory and a high-performance controller at its heart. Regardless of whether you're loading massive game files, editing HD videos, or simply booting up your computer, you can expect a lightning-fast performance that never skips a beat. The M.2 2280 single-sided architecture offers freedom for storage expansion and upgrades without sacrificing performance, ensuring smooth compatibility with a broad range of systems, including desktops, laptops, and even the PlayStation 5 game console. The Acer FA200 optimizes boot times, file transfers, and game loading rates by utilizing both the SLC Cache and the Host Memory Buffer (HMB) technology. Whether you're taking on challenging tasks or losing yourself in the newest video games, bid slow performance farewell and welcome to supercharged productivity. In addition to providing outstanding performance, Acer gave durability and dependability a priority while designing the FA200. The integrated design reinforces component stability, minimizing the risk of malfunctions and enhancing resistance to shocks and vibrations. Rest assured, your valuable data is safeguarded against potential hazards, ensuring peace of mind during intense gaming sessions or demanding creative tasks. Acer's dedication to quality is visible at every stage of the SSD's existence. Every unit is put through a comprehensive testing and assessment process to ensure unrivaled dependability and performance, starting with the careful design and material selection and continuing through the rigorous production and quality control processes. You can rely on the Acer FA200 to be a long-lasting storage option that continuously provides outstanding performance. The Acer FA200 500GB M.2 NVMe PCIe Gen4 x 4 SSD is designed to satisfy the needs of both gamers and multimedia creators, making it more than just a storage device. Unlock a new level of productivity and gaming brilliance with the Acer FA200, the pinnacle of speed, compatibility, and dependability.
